lead_paragraph: The announcement was criticized by Israeli officials who said it would encourage the Palestinians not to negotiate seriously.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone reported from the United Nations, and Steven Erlanger from Jerusalem.
byline.original: By RICK GLADSTONE and STEVEN ERLANGER

snippet: The announcement was criticized by Israeli officials who said it would encourage the Palestinians not to negotiate seriously.

headline.main: France Plans Mideast Peace Effort, and Recognition of Palestine if It Fails
headline.print_headline: France Plans Mideast Peace Effort, and Recognition of Palestine if It Fails

abstract: France announces it will organize international conference aimed at bringing end to Israeli-Palestinian conflict and that it will recognize Palestinian statehood if undertaking fails.
